00022 class CPSModuleAccessControlFilter extends CAccessControlFilter implements IPSBase
00023 {
00024     //********************************************************************************
00025     //* Public Methods
00026     //********************************************************************************

00034     protected function preFilter( $oFilterChain )
00035     {
00036         $_oApp = Yii::app();
00037         $_oModule = Yii::app()->controller->module;
00038         $_oRequest = $_oApp->getRequest();
00039         $_oUser = $_oModule->user;
00040         $_sVerb = $_oRequest->getRequestType();
00041         $_sIP = $_oRequest->getUserHostAddress();
00042         $_arRules = $this->getRules();
00043         
00044         foreach ( $_arRules as $_oRule )
00045         {
00046             //  Is allowed?
00047             if ( ( $_iAllow = $_oRule->isUserAllowed( $_oUser, $oFilterChain->controller, $oFilterChain->action, $_sIP, $_sVerb ) ) > 0 )
00048                 return true;
00049             
00050             if ( $_iAllow < 0 )
00051             {
00052                 $this->accessDenied( $_oUser );
00053                 return false;
00054             }
00055         }
00056 
00057         //  If we made it here, it's all good...
00058         return true;
00059     }
00060 
00061 }
